name: Cacophonous Call, Mass
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: one creature/level (all of which must be within 30 feet)
text: This spell functions as cacophonous call, except that is affects multiple creatures.
target_zh: 每等级1名生物 (所有目标之间的距离不超过30尺)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同扰神唤音 (Cacophonous Call) 一般，不过该法术可以影响复数生物。
